title: ðŸ“¬ Mailbag Monday: Should we judge coaches based on records in one-score games? (Football 6/22)
description:
Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough lead this edition of the mailbag, without a vacationing Will Brinson. What alcoholic drink would each of the Superfriends be? Ryan, John and Sean dish out fantasy advice, discuss the importance of coaching in one-score games, address expansion in the NFL and dissect Sam Darnold.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â
